title: Size and Layout
description: The square footage and number of rooms affect the time and resources required. Larger homes or offices generally require more attention and may adjust the price accordingly.

title: Type of Cleainng
description: Routine housekeeping, deep cleaning, move-in/move-out services, or special requests all differ in scope. Each service type is priced based on the level of detail and effort involved.

title: Frequency of Service
description: Regular cleaning plans, such as weekly or bi-weekly visits, often qualify for discounted rates compared to one-time sessions.

title: Special Requirements
description: Additional tasks such as carpet treatment, window washing, or organizing can influence the estimate. Weâ€™ll adjust the plan to match your specific needs.
